Text:
Hi. Just found your profile. I must say thank you very much for uploading 480p. I believe 480p is good enough for mobile devices, laptops and TVs of 40 inches and below. Most people are pointlessly obsessed with HD even though their equipment cannot show HD in all its glory.

Pls I'm looking for this film: The Preacher's Daughter - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1724982/

I haven't been able to find it anywhere online. Thanks very much.
